object.name: StoryAreaTypeSuggestedReaction
object.description: Describes a story area pointing to a suggested reaction. Currently, a story can have up to 5 suggested reaction areas.
object.html_description: Describes a story area pointing to a suggested reaction. Currently, a story can have up to 5 suggested reaction areas.
object.rst_description: Describes a story area pointing to a suggested reaction. Currently, a story can have up to 5 suggested reaction areas.

annotations.description: Pass True if the reaction area has a dark background
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True if the reaction area has a dark background
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` if the reaction area has a dark background
annotations.name: is_dark

annotations.description: Pass True if reaction area corner is flipped
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True if reaction area corner is flipped
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` if reaction area corner is flipped
annotations.name: is_flipped
